segmentValuesArray.resultText:
You’re good to Go to Funky Chow Kitchen for their Godzilla Roll

Sushi Rice, Lobster, Tempura Fried Asparagus, Avocado, Wagyu Beef, Truffle Oil, Scallions.

You’re good to Go to The Grand Cantina for their Barbacoa Taco

Corn Tortilla, Slow Roasted Beef, White Onion, Cilantro, Chipotle Peppers, Lime.

You’re good to Go to Slices Pizza for The Windsor Pie

White Flour, Whole Wheat Flour, Tomato Sauce, Mozzarella Cheese, Shredded Pepperoni, Canned Mushrooms, Green Peppers and White Onions

You’re good to Go to Dope As Duck for their Braised Brisket Sandwich

Pickled onions , Mayo, Cabbage, Braised Beef Brisket, Mustard, Brioche bun.

You’re good to Go to Sitara Indian Cuisine for their Butter Chicken

Chicken breasts, ginger, plain yogurt, crushed tomatoes, turmeric powder, Dried fenugreek leaves, garlic.

You’re good to Go to Eva’s Original Chimneys for their Caprisi Chimwich

Chimney Cone, Tomato, Reduced Balsamic, Pesto, Onion and Mozzarella
